meanings.definition: To change or rearrange something in a new way.
meanings.sent1: She rejiggers her room layout every month.
meanings.sent2: He often rejiggers his schedule to fit in more study time.
meanings.sent3: The cat rejiggers the furniture by pushing it around playfully.
meanings.sent4: The artist rejiggers reality in his paintings, creating a new world.
meanings.sent5: Rejiggers can bring a fresh perspective to old problems.

meanings.definition: A person who changes or rearranges things.
meanings.sent1: The rejiggers at the office always come up with creative solutions.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the rejiggers in the family for her knack for organization.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly declared herself the official family rejiggers.
meanings.sent4: The rejiggers in the workshop transformed scrap metal into art.
meanings.sent5: The rejiggers in the team are essential for adapting to new challenges.
